abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Lepus microtis Heuglin, 1865" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Occurrence records of mammal species in Tana River Basin, Kenya 1 records from Liste d'espèces animales recensées au cours des activités de l'Organisation pour le Développement Durable et la Biodiversité (ODDB ONG) au Bénin 1 records from Mammifères des mangroves et des zones humides du sud Togo 1 records from Mammals housed at MHNG, Geneva 1 records from naturgucker 1 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 2 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 2 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 2 records from Census of animal of Benin: Database 1 3 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Mammalia 5 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Museum collection digitized at storage unit level 5 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Mammals 13 records from Making the zoology collection at the Natural History Museum of Zimbabwe accessible through GBIF by end of 2017 (BID-AF2015-0117-SMA) 14 records from AMNH Mammal Collections 20 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 22 records from List of animalia, fungi and plant species recorded through naturalist observations and research activities in Benin. Data mobilized in the framework of a JRS Biodiversity Foundation project of Benin 34 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 60 records from RBINS DaRWIN 64 records from IICT Colecção Zoológica 222 records from Levantamento de Mamíferos do Parque Nacional da Quiçama - INBAC/RWCP - 2017 245 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records
